H0.text: What are motorways called in Germany . Bundesstraße

H1.text: What are motorways called in Germany . Schnellweg

H2.text: What are motorways called in Germany . Kraftfahrstraße

H3.text: What are motorways called in Germany . Autoban

A4.text: Only federally built controlled-access highways with certain construction standards including at least two lanes per direction are called Bundesautobahn.

A5.text: Various other controlled-access highways exist on the federal (Bundesstraße), state (Landesstraße), district, and municipal level but are not part of the Autobahn network and are officially referred to as Kraftfahrstraße.

A6.text: The official German term is Bundesautobahn (plural Bundesautobahnen, abbreviated 'BAB'), which translates as 'federal motorway'.
